Sourcetable - Staff-level Engineers - San Francisco - ONSITE - https://sourcetable.com

We're building an AI spreadsheet and application platform for the next billion people. We are most commonly compared to Sheets/Gemini and Excel/Copilot, or referred to as "Cursor for Spreadsheets".

If you are an excellent full-stack engineer (React/Python) with good product sense and experience building hard things, please come talk to us. Most of our team are ex-founders, and there is an expectation that you can build end-to-end without requiring assistance from others. AI experience is nice but not required, this is a product engineering role.

There's a platform shift underway. Let's get after it!

eoin@sourcetable.com
